name: places/ChIJ73cXzjtZwokRheWItUO_Azc
adrFormatAddress: 405 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: I have always enjoyed visiting Uni K Wax and have been a loyal customer for an extended period. However, on Monday, August 28, I had scheduled an appointment for 7:45pm. Despite confirming the appointment and arriving on time, I found the front desk attendant had already locked the door and refused entry. She was extremely rude and careless. I understand that sometime people have a bad day but her behavior was unacceptable and lacked a service-minded towards a customer. I came all the way to an appointment and experienced this. The experience left me feeling quite upset. I won't be returning to this location again due to the terrible service.

originalText.text: Came for a walk in 1st time and got Seen within 15 mins (had to do paper work and they were mopping) the wax really felt organic and didn't hurt as bad as it normally would at other places. Very clean wax without needing to tweeze, finished in about 15 mins as well.  This Brazil feels extra smooth. I really liked it

originalText.text:
1/14/2024 - Had an appointment today and once again, received wonderful service. Special thank you to Rebecca who did an amazing job with my service as well as Camila, who always greets me warmly at the reception desk. Kudos to the gentleman who takes care of the wax too. Highly recommend. This Uni K Wax Studio is top notch in my book!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------8/30/2023 - Stopped by again at this location and was fortunate to get right in without a reservation. Special thank you to Willizbeth and Sanchi! My service was perfect! Thank you!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7/2023 - This location is perfect (a few blocks from Trader Joe's!). I've been going to Uni K Wax for years and they are consistently great, professional and reasonably priced. This location is spotless! Special shout out to Jessica, Camilia and Jackie! The staff is super welcoming, friendly, professional and efficient.

Highly recommend!

originalText.text: The great experience start once you open the door. The studio is new, very clean and receptionist very friendly. My waxer Eliza is excellent. Very patient and explains me every step, The wax is so gentle. 100% recommended.

text.text: The great experience start once you open the door. The studio is new, very clean and receptionist very friendly. My waxer Eliza is excellent. Very patient and explains me every step, The wax is so gentle. 100% recommended.

originalText.text: appointment was cancelled 5 minutes prior because waxer didn’t come in. they didn’t offer any way to make it up/ solution. very inconsiderate of customer’s time.
